articles.title: Press Conference and Photo Exhibition Held at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Press Conference and Photo Exhibition Held at Russian Embassy
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A press conference and a photo exhibition took place at the Russian embassy here on Monday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there were media persons, officials concerned and staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 Russian Ambassador Valery Sukhinin addressed the press conference.
					
					 He referred to the fact that over the past six decades the two countries have strengthened and developed the friendly relations, supporting and cooperating with each other in the international arena. 
					
					 He stressed that President Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to the development of the bilateral relations as evidenced by the fact that in 1949 he gave his first official visit to the Soviet Union and concluded an agreement on economic and cultural cooperation.
					
					 He said that Russia is pleased with the successes made by the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and achieve the country's reunification under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He pointed to the fact that a ground-breaking ceremony for the reconstruction of the Rajin-Khasan Railways and Rajin Port was successfully held recently and a prospect of new cooperation was opening in the economic field between the two countries.
					
					 He expressed belief that the relations between Russia and the DPRK with a 60-year-long history would steadily develop in the future, too.
					
					  Then, he answered questions put by reporters.
					
					  Prior to the press conference, its participants looked round photos dealing with the history of the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Control Aid System of Barrages on Taedong River
articles.content:
Control Aid System of Barrages on Taedong River
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Earth Environmental Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University has developed a control aid system of  barrages on the Taedong River, thus opening a prospect to place the control of barrages and reservoirs on a scientific and IT basis.
					It has been made possible to take prompt and accurate measures against floods according to forecast by getting hourly information about the management of the barrages and reservoirs on the basis of a geographical information system.
					
					In other words, it has become possible to adjust the amount of water of the barrage reservoirs in case of floods and rationally supply water to the industrial and agricultural sectors and to living quarters under normal conditions by receiving data about the water level, the amount of the discharge of water and precipitation, etc. from each watch station and analyzing them comprehensively.
					
					Possessed of data for meeting hydrological requirements, the data center helps make a scientific decision when a dangerous situation is created.
					
					The barrages of the Taedong River and reservoirs on its reaches can be managed on a new scientific basis with the introduction of the new system.
					
					The system was highly appreciated at scientific and technological exhibitions including the National Exhibition of Young People's Scientific and Technological Achievements held this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Steadily Glorifying DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Steadily Glorifying DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might", a discourse of General Secretary Kim Jong Il given to Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Minju Joson, the organ of the DPRK government, is evoking lively response from among all servicepersons and people in the DPRK.
					The work reviews with pride the 60-year-long history of the DPRK which has covered the road of the most shining victory under the guidance of the great leader and the great party. And comprehensively expounded in it are the popular and independent character of the DPRK, which has applied the Juche idea in the nation-building and state activities, and its invincible might and the tasks and ways for pushing ahead with the building of a great prosperous powerful nation.
					
					 The publication of the work is a noteworthy event as it provided a new historic landmark to the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK working hard to carry forward and accomplish President Kim Il Sung's cause of building a rich and powerful country, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial on Monday.
					
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The publication of the work has made it possible for the army and people of the DPRK to more deeply cherish the great honor and pride of advancing along the straightest road of building a rich and powerful country under the guidance of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also implanted in the hearts of the Korean army and people the validity and inexhaustible vitality of the WPK's Juche-based idea and line of nation-building as more steadfast faith and provided them with highly important guidelines for pushing ahead with the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its dignity as a prosperous and powerful socialist country entirely thanks to the President's great Juche-based idea and line of nation-building and the great leadership of the WPK creditably carrying them into practice.
					
					 The ongoing drive to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation is the movement of new higher stage to add luster to the President's Juche-based idea and cause of nation-building.
					
					 It is the rock-firm faith of the army and people of the DPRK that only when they hold fast to the idea and theory of the work and thoroughly carry them out, can they successfully accomplish the cause of building a rich and powerful country, the socialist cause of Juche pioneered by the President.
					
					 It is the unshakable patriotic will of Kim Jong Il to always glorify the country as a great prosperous powerful socialist nation of Juche and as great Kim Il Sung's Korea, the editorial says, calling upon all the people to work hard to make the socialist country of Juche shining with the august name and exploits of the President more rich and powerful under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today devotes a signed article to the 20th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Present Times and the Tasks Facing Young People" (October 12, 1988).
					 The work deals with precious ideas and theories calling for deeply imbuing the young people with a genuine revolutionary view on life and noble sense of the mission they have assumed before the times. They include the idea that the young people should find the worth of a genuine life and glorify their life in devoting themselves to the cause of independence against imperialism, the idea that they should properly understand the fundamental superiority of a socialist society to a capitalist society and the idea that they should firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea and display high revolutionary spirit and fidelity in carrying out their revolutionary tasks.
					
					 The ideas and theories enunciated in the work have displayed great vitality in strengthening and developing the youth movement in the DPRK over the past two decades, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The vitality of the work finds a clear manifestation in the fact that the young people in the DPRK have been prepared as the young vanguard intensely loyal to cause of the WPK.
					
					 Among the reliable young people there are many heroes who blew themselves up and acted human bullets and bombs in order to defend the security and authority of the headquarters of the revolution at the cost of their lives and many standard-bearers in the innovation drive who have fully displayed their spirit in carrying out the party policies.
					
					 A lot of young people volunteered to work in difficult and labor consuming fields of socialist construction and some of them got married with honored wounded soldiers. This beautiful trait can be displayed only by the young people who have grown up under the care of the Party.
					
					 The vitality also finds a clear expression in the fact that the young people in the DPRK have become revolutionaries of the new generation transparent in their anti-imperialist and working-class consciousness and the spirit of defending socialism.
					
					 The DPRK has won a shining victory in the acute confrontation with the imperialist reactionaries for more than a decade because the young people with transparent working-class consciousness and ardent patriotism have stood firm guard over all fronts of the revolution and construction including the anti-imperialist military front.
					
					 The vitality was clearly expressed in the fact that the young people have strikingly demonstrated their wisdom and bravery in all work sites for building a great prosperous powerful nation.
					
					 Monumental edifices that go with the word of Chongnyon (youth) are found everywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 The WPK and the people are highly proud of having big units of young revolutionaries who have transparent idea and faith and strong sense of organization and discipline and are capable of doing anything regarded impossible.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- All Koreans should fully display the spirit of "By our nation itself" in order to meet the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, firmly adhere to the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, and successfully implement it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The spirit of "By our nation itself" is inseparably linked with the October 4 declaration.
					
					 "By our nation itself" is the main spirit of the October 4 declaration as is the case with the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The above-said spirit gives a powerful impetus to the struggle to adhere to the historic October 4 declaration and implement it. 
					
					 The spirit powerfully encourages all compatriots at home and abroad to creditably perform their role, united close as one under the banner of reunification, keenly aware of their responsibility as the driving force for the movement for national reunification. 
					
					It is the essence of the above-said spirit that all Koreans should solve the issue of national reunification by their concerted efforts in line with the independent will and wishes of the nation, aware of being responsible for achieving it. 
					
					 The spirit of "By our nation itself" serves as a powerful engine encouraging all Koreans to implement the October 4 declaration as it is the main spirit of the historic October 4 declaration and embodies the consciousness of national independence and the idea of great national unity.
					
					 The moves of the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea to hamstring the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration find a concentric manifestation in its efforts to stamp out the spirit of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the hearts of the Korean nation as the patriotic idea for reunification.
					
					 The October 4 declaration is not something that one is allowed to fail to implement in the way of developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification.
					
					 Whether national reunification is achieved or not hinges on how to implement the above-said north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Space Development
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Space Development
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- It is natural for every country and nation to develop and use space in line with its socio-economic progress, development of civilization and interests and the will and wishes of humankind. 
					 There can be no specified country in this respect and such thing should not be tolerated. Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed commentary. It goes on:
					
					 The space development has been a monopoly of the developed countries in the past. But it is quite different in the present times when the international environment has changed and the world entered the age of information industry.
					
					 As the world today shows, developing countries as well as developed ones are actively exploring the area of space development, accelerating the scientific and technological development. 
					
					 The space development has become an irresistible international trend and entered a new phase of development.
					
					 What is important here is that the space development should strictly serve a peaceful purpose and be favorable for international security and the development of human civilization.
					
					 But what should not be overlooked is that the undesirable forces are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to use the space for a military purpose in order to achieve their criminal aims. The U.S. is conducting what it called exercises of shooting down satellites, putting spurs to the building of missile shields in a bid to establish a military monopoly on the space and realize its wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 Japan is hell-bent on the criminal moves to use the space for its military purpose as evidenced by its launch of spy satellites and the enaction of the "basic law on space", etc., pursuant to the U.S. policy for space militarization.
					
					 The reality requires the world peace-loving people to check the dangerous space militarization and push forward the space development for a peaceful purpose. This is the principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently maintained the stand on the peaceful space research and development, regardless of what others claimed. 
					
					 The DPRK will go ahead in the direction chosen by itself, swimming with the trend of the development of the times when the world is heading for peaceful space exploration.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Remarks Refuted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Remarks Refuted
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The group of the Grand National Party of south Korea shortly ago in the "inspection of the administration" of the Ministry of Unification let loose such a string of balderdash as playing down the historic significance of the October 4 declaration, claiming that it is peppered with "agreed points" which failed to get "sympathy from people".
					 They went the lengths of asserting that the preceding regime "unilaterally agreed" on the projects requiring a huge "budget" and letting loose the vituperation that it is "a matter to be prosecuted."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What they uttered is little short of an open declaration of their intention to nullify the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and stand in head-on confrontation with the north.
					
					 The reckless remarks made by the GNP gentries as a provocation to the north in blatant defiance of the October 4 declaration are a direct product of traitor Lee Myung Bak's policy of confrontation with the north.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that although Lee is behaving ridiculously, paying lip-service to "co-existence and co-prosperity", "sincerity" and "openhearted dialogue" they are, in actuality, nothing but sheer lies and deception and a farce to hide his anti-reunification nature.
					
					 The GNP is running wild in the confrontation with the north and the anti-reunification racket as a hand-raising machine serving the traitorous clique, touching off towering hatred and anger of all the Koreans.
					
					 The desperate efforts made by the Lee group to block the advance of the June 15 era of reunification, defiling even the north-south joint declaration, will only precipitate their own self-destruction.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to behave themselves, cogitating about the catastrophic impact their reckless anti-reunification acts will have on the inter-Korean relations and the prospect of the nation.

articles.title: Moves to Revise Ordinance Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Retrogressive Revision of History Textbooks under Fire
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the joint measure committee for settling the issue of history textbooks grouping organizations for history studies, educational organizations and teachers in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on October 9 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' moves for the retrogressive revision of history textbooks.
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the authorities of working hard to make a retrogressive revision of history textbooks these days, asserting that "the existing history textbooks are written to meet the leftist purpose."
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable, they said, declaring that all the academic and educational circles, civic and public organizations and parents of students will pool their efforts to strongly counter the above-mentioned moves.
					
					 A press release read out there assailed the authorities for putting pressure upon publishing houses and other institutions to rewrite even those history textbooks which had undergone proper screening according to the necessary procedure, finding fault with them. 
					
					 It also charged that some educational inspectors are taking issue with the contents of the present textbooks, talking about "ideological deviation" and openly trying to exercise influence on the screening of textbooks.
					
					 Terming these actions anachronistic ones as they make the textbook screening system meaningless and moves to bring back the past period of dictatorship, the press release urged the authorities to immediately stop the moves for the retrogressive revision of textbooks.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Politics Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Politics Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An "emergency meeting on situation" was held in Seoul on October 9 to denounce the unpopular politics pursued by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 Present there were representatives of different civic and public organizations and political parties including the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea, the South Side Committee of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, Women's Solidarity of south Korea, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society, the All-People Action for Checking Moves to Control Broadcasting and Suppression of Netizens, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Health and Medical Organizations and the Democratic Labor Party.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that unpopular actions of the Lee Myung Bak regime going against the times were getting pronounced as the days go by. 
					
					 They declared that they could no longer tolerate the suppression of people intensified by the present regime under the pretext of "security" and its wrong policy. 
					
					 People should not merely criticize Lee Myung Bak's acts of treachery but form a front of anti-dictatorship struggle and launch full-dressed actions, they stressed.
					
					 A declaration read out there noted that the people's living has deteriorated and the economic crisis further deepened since the appearance of the present regime.
					
					 It stressed that over hundreds of organizations in different parts of south Korea would actively turn out in the above-said actions and proclaim the formation of the solidarity body on October 25.

articles.title: Rehabilitation of Martyrs for Democracy Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rehabilitation of Martyrs for Democracy Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of Bereaved Families for Probing into the Truth behind Suspicious Deaths and the Solidarity Meeting of Organizations to Honor Memory of Martyrs for the Nation and Democracy in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on October 6 at which they urged the puppet authorities to rehabilitate the martyrs for democracy.
					 A press release read out there referred to the fact that the "deliberation commission on rehabilitation of those involved in the movement for democratization and compensation to them," an organ under the "prime minister's" control, is these days reversing the decisions on rehabilitation of martyrs for democracy which were made by the "committee for probing into the truth behind suspicious deaths" after its investigation of several years.
					
					 This shows that the "deliberation commission" has zealously joined in the moves of the present "government" and the conservative forces who regard the movement for democratization as unacceptable, revising history textbooks to beautify the past dictatorial regimes, it pointed out.
					
					 It stressed that the "deliberation commission" should not deny the movement for democratization in support of the "government" and the conservative forces but discharge its responsibility to rehabilitate the martyrs for democracy.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Tajikistan and round-table talks in the Czech Republic and a lecture and reading session in Ethiopia on October 4 and 6 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A secretary of the Sogd Regional Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said that the WPK has creditably performed its mission and role as a guiding force of the Korean revolution under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK has invariably advanced along the road of independence, the road of socialism, foiling all the moves of imperialists against socialism, true to the Songun idea.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Central Committee of the Czech, Moravian and Silesian Trade Unions' Association noted that the WPK has powerfully demonstrated its anti-imperialist independent stand to the whole world under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding that Kim Jong Il has pursued an original Songun policy to defend the sovereignty of the country and win a victory in the struggle against imperialism under the grave situation where the U.S. imperialists became evermore undisguised in their moves against the DPRK at the end of the past century.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the WPK in the struggle to foil the imperialists' moves, holding aloft the banner of Songun, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Addis Ababa Youth Association explained in detail the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the party construction and Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Czech Organization
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Czech Organization
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech－Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on October 6 on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The statement said that the proposal for founding the DFRK set forth by President Kim Il Sung comprehensively deals with the principles and ways for founding a federal state, functions of the federal government and the regional governments and the character of the federal state.
					
					 It noted that the proposal for reunification by federal formula is acceptable to everybody as it is the most realistic and reasonable way for achieving Korea's reunification.
					
					 We actively support the above-said proposal and express firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for the country's reunification, it pointed out.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Mexico
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Mexico 
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued bulletin No. 25 entitled "Fluttering Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea" on October 1 on the occasion of the 63rd founding anniversary of the WPK and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The bulletin said in its article that more than six decades covered by the WPK are a history in which it has steadily advanced, demonstrating its victory and glory under the unfurled flag of the party emblazoned with a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush.
					
					 The WPK has successfully carried out its mission and role as a guiding force of the Korean people, it said, and went on:
					
					 In the 1990s the Korean people faced indescribably stern ordeal due to the political and military pressure and economic sanctions of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and repeated severe natural calamities. However, they firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and socialism, weathering out trials under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK has advanced along the only road of victory without making even a single mistake and undergoing twists and turns in implementing its line despite all sorts of tempests of history. This was possible entirely thanks to the distinguished great men. 
					
					 The WPK was founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and its history and tradition have been given steady continuity by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. It is, therefore, fully demonstrating its might as an organizer and guide of all the victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK is invincible because it has the Juche idea, a guiding idea publicly recognized in the era of independence, as its steadfast guidelines. 
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious under its fluttering flag, a symbol of victory and glory.
					
					 The bulletin also carried the picture of the emblem of the WPK.

articles.title: First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in Russia
articles.content:
First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An event was held in Moscow on October 9 by the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The reporter and speakers at the event highly praised the undying exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the efforts to accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 They noted that the north-south summit meeting was held in October last year and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted thanks to the farsighted wisdom and great courageous decision of Kim Jong Il to carry out the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification without fail.
					
					 They accused the sycophantic and treacherous Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea of totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and chilling the desire of the compatriots for national reunification.
					
					 They declared that the reunification of the country is sure to be achieved when all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas remain true to the idea of "By our nation itself" and sincerely embody it.
					
					 Overseas compatriots will deeply grasp the historical significance, vitality and validity of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and turn out as one in the struggle for national reunification, they added.

articles.title: Sistema de administracion de esclusas en cuenca del rio Taedong
articles.content:
Sistema de administracion de esclusas en cuenca del rio Taedong
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- La facultad de la Ciencia del Medioambiente de la Tierra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung acabo de desarrollar el sistema de apoyo a la administracion de esclusas en la cuenca del rio Taedong que abrio perspectivas de impulsar esta labor de manera cientifica e informatizada.
					Este sistema permite tomar rapida y exactamente las medidas correspondientes al pronostico de inundaciones al exigir informar a cada hora el estado de la gestion de esclusas y represas basandose en el sistema informativo geografico.
					
					Es decir, analiza generalmente los datos recibidos desde todos los puestos de vigilancia como el nivel de agua, la cantidad de aguas en fuga, la precipitacion, etc. para controlar el caudal de esclusas y embalses cuando ocurra una inundacion y para suministrar usualmente con eficiencia las aguas necesarias a la industria y agricultura y a la vida de los habitantes.
					
					Ademas, en la base de datos del sistema hay los materiales de utilidad para resolver los problemas hidrologicos, lo que contribuye a adoptar una decision cientifica cuando surjan circunstancias peligrosas.
					
					El nuevo programa fue apreciado en la Exhibicion Nacional de los Exitos Cientificos y Tecnicos de Jovenes montada este ano y otros festivales de la rama.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun defiende explotacion espacial de paises en via de desarrollo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun defiende explotacion espacial de paises en via de desarrollo
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual publicado este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun destaca que ningun pais o nacion puede tener privilegios en desarrollar y usar el cosmos conforme al desarrollo socioeconomico y de civilizacion e intereses de cada cual y a la aspiracion y demanda de la humanidad.
					En el pasado, el desarrollo espacial ha sido monopolizado por los paises desarrollados, comienza el comentarista y continua:
					
					Pero, esa situacion ha cambiado hoy dia cuando hubo alteraciones en el ambiente internacional y el mundo entro en la epoca de la industria de IT.
					
					Ademas de los paises desarrollados, los en vias de desarrollo aceleran tambien el desarrollo cientifico y tecnico y se lanzan activamente a la explotacion cosmica.
					
					En la actualidad, esta labor deviene la infrenable corriente internacional y entro en la nueva etapa del desarrollo.
					
					Lo mas importante es que el desarrollo espacial debe realizarse en fines exclusivamente pacificos y de manera util para la seguridad internacional y el desarrollo de civilizacion de la humanidad. 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que las fuerzas malsanas lo impulsan abiertamente con objetivos militares para realizar su ambicion criminal.
					
					Partiendo de su intencion de monopolizar militarmente el cosmos y usarlo en la toma de heguemonia mundial, EE.UU. da acicate al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles efectuando las pruebas de interceptacion del satelite artificial.
					
					Adhiriendose a la politica norteamericana de militarizacion cosmica, Japon lanza los satelites espias e inventa la "ley principal del cosmos", como parte de sus criminales maniobras para usar la galaxia en fines militares.
					
					La realidad demanda que los pueblos pacifistas del mundo detengan los peligrosos movimientos por la militarizacion del cosmos y aceleren el desarrollo espacial pacifico. Esto es precisamente la posicion de principios de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  La RPDC mantiene invariablemente la posicion del estudio y desarrollo del cosmos con objetivos pacificos sin hacer caso a lo que digan otros.
					
					  Y seguira avanzando en el rumbo escogido en sintonia con la tendencia mundial de la epoca hacia el desarrollo pacifico del cosmos

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por glorificar RPDC como potencia socialista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por glorificar RPDC como potencia socialista
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- Las declaraciones del Dirigente Kim Jong Il intituladas "La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio" dadas a los periodicos Rodong Sinmun y Minju Joson, organos del partido y del gobierno, suscitan gran repercusion entre todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y otros habitantes de Corea.
					Esta obra hace balance con gran orgullo sobre la historia de 60 anos de la RPDC que habia recorrido el camino de victoria mas resonante bajo la direccion del gran Lider y el gran Partido, aclara el caracter popular e independiente y el invencible poderio de la RPDC que materializa la idea Juche en la construccion del Estado y en sus actividades y dilucida integralmente las tareas de lucha y los medios para acelerar con vigor la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en  su editorial de este lunes, senala que esto es un evento especial que indico el nuevo jalon historico ante el camino del Partido del Trabajo, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que heredan y llevan a cabo la causa de construccion de la patria prospera del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y continua:
					
					Con la publicacion de esta obra, todo el ejercito y pueblo de Corea guardan profundamente en el corazon el gran orgullo y la dignidad de haber  recorrido por el mas recto camino para la construccion de la patria prospera bajo la sabia direccion del gran Lider y el gran Dirigente.
					
					Ademas, fueron guardadas en cada corazon del ejercito y el pueblo como la mas firme conviccion la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la idea y la linea autoctonas del PTC en materia de construccion del Estado y fue preparada la guia programatica que permite a ellos acelerar con mayor vigor la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					La RPDC exalta tanto su dignidad del pais socialista prospera, lo cual se debe enteramente a que son grandes la idea y la linea autoctonas del Presidente acerca de la construccion del Estado y es grandiosa la direccion del PTC que las materializa brillantemente.
					
					La lucha de hoy por la construccion de la potencia prospera socialista es la de nueva etapa alta para hacer brillar la idea y la causa autoctonas del Presidente sobre la construccion del Estado.
					
					Al materializar cabalmente la idea y la teoria de la obra, se llevara a feliz termino la causa de la construccion de la patria prospera, causa  socialista del Juche iniciada por el Presidente, lo cual es la firme conviccion del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Hacer brillar eternamente nuestro pais y nuestra patria como la potencia prospera socialista del Juche y la Corea de Kim Il Sung deviene la invariable voluntad patriotica del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. Todos los coreanos deben luchar vigorosamente por  hacer mas prospera la patria socialista del Juche que brilla con el respetuoso nombre del Presidente y sus hazanas bajo la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- En la reciente "inspeccion parlamentaria" sobre el "Ministerio de Reunificacion", los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional (GPN)" del Sur de Corea restaron el significado historico de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre diciendo que esta es el "acuerdo" que "no consiguio la simpatia del pueblo".
					Para colmo, senalaron que el anterior "poder" "firmo unilateralmente" ese acuerdo que requiere muchos "fondos presupuestarios" y se atrevieron a calificarlo de "caso que merece ser acusado".
					
					Tal palabra de los compinches del "GPN" significa la declaracion abierta de que invalidarian la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y se enfrentarian frontalmente con el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 13 y continua:
					
					Tal conducta temeraria del "GPN" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es producto inevitable de la politica conflictiva con esta del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					La realidad demuestra a las claras que la "convivencia", la "coprosperidad", la "sinceridad" y el "dialogo franco", de que habla tanto ese traidor, no pasan de ser un fraude, engano y farsa para encubrir su naturaleza anti-reunificacion.
					
					Los alborotos de enfrentamiento  fratricida y anti-reunificacion del "GPN", que actua como aparato de votacion de la banda de Lee, causan gran odio e indignacion de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					    Aunque la banda de Lee maniobra desesperadamente para detener el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio censurando hasta la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur, eso acelerara solo su autodestruccion.
					
					  Los pandilleros liderados por Lee deben actuar con prudencia reflexionando seriamente de las consecuencias destructivas que produciran sus insensatas maniobras anti-reunificacion en las relaciones intercoreanas y el futuro de la nacion.
